line_1: She'd spread her Wings, and bid the world goodnight.
line_2: O would'st thou break her Chain, with what delight

line_1: I gave a deep sigh, and I bid them goodnight;
line_2: Thus finding myself in a pitiful plight;

line_1: And bids the weary Labourer Good-night.
line_2: At length he veils his purple Face from Sight,
